email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, DWT 150,000, LOA 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to the low 50s? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can offer $51.25 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the laycan for 15-20 October? Also, please confirm the vessel's availability and send over the charter party for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. The laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October, and the MV Ocean Star is available. I'll send over the charter party shortly. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. I've reviewed the charter party, and everything looks good. Let's proceed with the agreed terms. Looking forward to a smooth shipment. Best, John
